translation.feedback: [CY] This is a new service – your feedback will help us to improve it.
translation.ogl: [CY] All content is available under the Open Government Licence v3.0, except where otherwise stated
translation.cookieText: [CY] GOV.UK uses cookies to make the site simpler. Find out more about cookies
translation.emailIfProblems: [CY] Send us a message
translation.responseTime: [CY] We aim to get back to you within 5 days
translation.chatDown: [CY] The web chat service is temporarily unavailable, please try again later.
translation.noAgentsAvailable: [CY] No agents are available, please try again later.
translation.allAgentsBusy: [CY] All our web chat agents are busy helping other people. Please try again later or contact us using one of the ways above.
translation.chatClosed: [CY] Web chat is now closed.\nOpening hours are {{courtOpeningHour}}.
translation.chatAlreadyOpen: [CY] A web chat window is already open.
